name: Gogok of Swiftness
flavorText: "You do not need to be stronger than your enemy, if you are faster of mind and body." -Queen Seondeok
flavorTextHtml: "You do not need to be stronger than your enemy, if you are faster of mind and body." -Queen Seondeok

secondary.textHtml: Gain Swiftness with every attack, increasing your Attack Speed by 1% and Dodge by 0.50% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 15 times. 0.50%
secondary.text: Gain Swiftness with every attack, increasing your Attack Speed by 1% and Dodge by 0.50% for 4 seconds. This effect stacks up to 15 times. 0.50%
